name: Vortex Attack: ボルテックスアタック
description: Vortex Attack is a frenetic arcade space shooter featuring worldwide tournaments and an intense local multiplayer mode.A worthy successor to Galaga for the XXI century.WARNING: Highly addictive.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Dual Core @ 2.4GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: ATI 7540HD DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Min specs could be lower.
recommended_requirements: Processor: CPU DUAL CORE @ 3GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 550 Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Tested in that hardware.

reviews.review_text: I've played my share of shooting games, while my wife (non-gamer) has seldom played the genre. We just played 2P Co-op and had a lot of fun! She felt challenged but learned the mechanics and game system quickly. We were literally sweating after our second run.  If you are into arcade shooters, especially if you love local multiplayer, this game will definitely keep you entertained with friends. We don't have one more extra player, but 3-player mode is definitely worth exploring.
